definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: And in the case of women, that often included sexual assault.
sentences.chinese: 如果女囚，还经常涉及到性侵犯。

sentences.english: You may recall Strauss-Kahn's caught up in a sex scandal.
sentences.chinese: 你可以回忆一下，卡恩现在深陷性侵犯丑闻。

sentences.english: Guards also sexually abused female prisoners according to the white paper.
sentences.chinese: 根据白皮书所说，监狱卫兵还对女犯人进行性侵犯。

sentences.english: Catching foreign child-sex tourists is only part of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕国外的那些儿童性侵犯游客只是问题的一方面。

sentences.english: And then, while pretending to search me for guns or knives, he abused me sexually.
sentences.chinese: 他假装在我身上搜查枪或刀，对我进行性侵犯。

sentences.english: Even girls who'd been sexually abused by their dads were taken out by them.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连遭受过父亲性侵犯的女孩也被带出去了。

sentences.english: Because of their dangerousness , attempts are treated the same as completed acts of criminal sexual abuse.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们的危险和意图被视同为实施性侵犯行为。

sentences.english: Some children have been sexualized by being sexually abused.
sentences.chinese: 有一些儿童由于遭受过性侵犯已经变得对性很渴望。

sentences.english: Those who sexually harrass the opposite sex will be punished by the law.
sentences.chinese: 异性进行性侵犯会受到法律制裁。

sentences.english: The top prosecutor in North Carolina concludes no attack occurred.
sentences.chinese: 北卡罗来那州最高检察官判定没有发生性侵犯。

sentences.english: Can Congress enforce a single-address rule for sex offenders?
sentences.chinese: 国会还要再让性侵犯者只能拥有一个地址？

sentences.english: No charges have been filed yet in the alleged incident.
sentences.chinese: 在这起性侵犯事件中，还没有任何控告编入档案。

sentences.english: In the boys’ schools, it says, sexual abuse was “endemic.”
sentences.chinese: 它指出，在男校里，性侵犯简直变成“地方特色”了。

sentences.english: A medical examination showed that she had been sexually molested but was still technically a virgin
sentences.chinese: 体检说明她受到过性侵犯，但技术上说她仍然是处女。

definition: domestic violence/abbr. for 家庭暴力[jia1 ting2 bao4 li4]
